Subskills.name: Sunburn
Subskills.description: Increases the maximum targets affected by eye of ra.

Subskills.name: Ray's of Wisdom
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt by sun rays based on your energy.

Subskills.name: God of Gods
Subskills.description: Unleash eye of ra on all nearby monsters. Eye of Ra now has a cooldown.

Subskills.name: Solar Flow
Subskills.description: Increases the range of the sun rays.

Subskills.name: Ultra Violet Radiation
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to inflict burning for a portion of the damage dealt by eye of ra.

Subskills.name: Scorching Sun
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to burning targets.

Subskills.name: Ra's Wrath
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of sun rays additionally inflicting slow on hit.

Subskills.name: Lightbringer
Subskills.description: Eye of Ra unleashes a storm of light pillars at the last target.

Subskills.name: Piercing Sunlight
Subskills.description: Increases critical strike damage dealt by eye of ra.

Subskills.name: Armed Light
Subskills.description: Increases attack rating when using eye of ra.

Subskills.name: Pillar of Light
Subskills.description: Unleash pillars of light in a narrow line each dealing damage over time and slowing on hit.

Subskills.name: Orbiting the Sun
Subskills.description: Unleash multiple light pillars orbiting you dealing increased damage.
